Created an attachment (id=14228)
Apache Error Log

The problem comes from the static parser, it generates invalid XML. The rule
based work fine.

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.util.EventFormatter.java was not removing 
excluding the surrogate blocks (e.g. 0xFFFE, and 0xFFFF) due to a performance 
improvement where text elements where not normalized in favor for CDATA 
sections.  

The fix is to reinstate normalization for text elements.

Code checked-in to HEAD on September 24, 2004.

NOTE:  This defect is not required for 3.0.2 since performance improvment was 
not in the 3.0.1 release.
correcting bugzilla target milestone -- setting back to 3.1 i2
